DOC.detailed_description: Lymphangioleiomyomatosis ( LAM ) rare disease woman characterize proliferation abnormal smooth muscle-like cell ( LAM cell ) lung , lead cystic destruction lung parenchyma , axial lymphatics , result lymphangioleiomyomas , abdominal angiomyolipomas , primarily kidney . Lymphangioleiomyomas may cause abdominal distension compress abdominal organ , produce obstipation , bladder obstruction neurological deficit . Leakage chyle may responsible ascites pleural effusion . The lymphangioleiomyomas may change size day . This variation tumor size may due increase chyle formation alteration lymphatic flow . These study however , perform research subject fast . Our hypothesis ingestion food increase chyle formation lymphatic flow , turn increase size lymphangioleiomyomas . The aim study test hypothesis . We propose conduct study 30 LAM patient lymphangioleiomyomas determine whether ingestion food , increase chyle formation lymphatic flow , increase size lymphangioleiomyomas .
